name: best-random
description: A replacement for Math.random() that is tiny, fast, seedable, and has good statistical properties.

scripts.bench: npm run build && cd bench && ts-node index.ts
scripts.test:u32: npm run build && cd tools && ts-node binout.ts best-random uint32 0 | RNG_Test stdin32 -seed 0 -tf 2 -te 1 -multithreaded
scripts.test:u53: npm run build && cd tools && ts-node binout.ts best-random uint53 0 | RNG_Test stdin -seed 0 -tf 2 -te 1 -multithreaded
scripts.test:u53l: npm run build && cd tools && ts-node binout.ts best-random uint53lo 0 | RNG_Test stdin32 -seed 0 -tf 2 -te 1 -multithreaded
scripts.make:rng: npm run make:rng:stdout && npm run make:testu01:rng
scripts.waitforkey: echo "Press [Enter] key to exit..." && read unused > /dev/null
scripts.screen: npm run make:rng && tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32h"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 33 'sh -c "npm run practrand:u64"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -p 50 -v 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32hr"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32lr"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32l"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.screen2: npm run make:rng && tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32h"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -p 50 -v 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32hr"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 75 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32lr"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 66 'sh -c "npm run practrand:u32hr -- -singlethreaded"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run practrand:u64 -- -singlethreaded"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 75 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32l"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 66 'sh -c "npm run practrand:u32h -- -singlethreaded"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run practrand:u32l -- -singlethreaded"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.practrand: npm run make:rng && tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run practrand:64b:u64 -- -singlethreaded"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -p 66 -h 'sh -c "npm run practrand:128b:u64 -- -singlethreaded"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h 'sh -c "npm run practrand:u64"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.cycle: cd tools/cycle && tmux new-session 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 0"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -p 50 -v 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 4"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 75 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 5"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 66 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 6"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 7"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 75 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 1"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 66 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 2"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 3"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.smallcrush:u32h:x5: npm run smallcrush:u32h && npm run smallcrush:u32h && npm run smallcrush:u32h && npm run smallcrush:u32h && npm run smallcrush:u32h
scripts.smallcrush:u32hr:x5: npm run smallcrush:u32hr && npm run smallcrush:u32hr && npm run smallcrush:u32hr && npm run smallcrush:u32hr && npm run smallcrush:u32hr
scripts.smallcrush:u32l:x5: npm run smallcrush:u32l && npm run smallcrush:u32l && npm run smallcrush:u32l && npm run smallcrush:u32l && npm run smallcrush:u32l
scripts.smallcrush:u32lr:x5: npm run smallcrush:u32lr && npm run smallcrush:u32lr && npm run smallcrush:u32lr && npm run smallcrush:u32lr && npm run smallcrush:u32lr
scripts.crush: npm run make:rng && tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run crush:u64r && npm run crush:u64"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -p 66 -h 'sh -c "npm run crush:u32hr && npm run crush:u32h"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h 'sh -c "npm run crush:u32lr && npm run crush:u32l"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.crush:all: npm run make:rng && tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run crush:64b:u64r && npm run crush:64b:u64 && npm run crush:64b:u32lr && npm run crush:64b:u32hr && npm run crush:64b:u32l && npm run crush:64b:u32h"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -p 66 -h 'sh -c "npm run crush:128b:u64r && npm run crush:128b:u64 && npm run crush:128b:u32lr && npm run crush:128b:u32hr && npm run crush:128b:u32l && npm run crush:128b:u32h"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h 'sh -c "npm run crush:u64r && npm run crush:u64 && npm run crush:u32lr && npm run crush:u32hr && npm run crush:u32l && npm run crush:u32h"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.bigcrush: npm run make:rng && tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run bigcrush:u64 && npm run bigcrush:u64r"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -p 66 -h 'sh -c "npm run bigcrush:u32h && npm run bigcrush:u32hr"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h 'sh -c "npm run bigcrush:u32l && npm run bigcrush:u32lr"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.allcrush:u32h: npm run smallcrush:u32h:x5 && npm run crush:u32h && npm run bigcrush:u32h
scripts.allcrush:u32hr: npm run smallcrush:u32hr:x5 && npm run crush:u32hr && npm run bigcrush:u32hr
scripts.allcrush:u32l: npm run smallcrush:u32l:x5 && npm run crush:u32l && npm run bigcrush:u32l
scripts.allcrush:u32lr: npm run smallcrush:u32lr:x5 && npm run crush:u32lr && npm run bigcrush:u32lr
scripts.allcrush: npm run make:rng && tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32h"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -p 50 -v 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32hr"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32lr"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32l"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.allcrush:pcg: npm run make:rng:pcg && tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32h"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -p 50 -v 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32hr"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32lr"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32l"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.test:all: npm run make:rng && tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u64; npm run waitforkey"' \; split-window -p 66 -v 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u64r; npm run waitforkey"' \; split-window -p 50 -v 'sh -c "npm run practrand:128b:u64 -- -singlethreaded; npm run waitforkey"' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 66 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32h; npm run waitforkey"' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32hr; npm run waitforkey"' \; select-pane -t 3 \; split-window -h -p 66 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32l; npm run waitforkey"' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32lr; npm run waitforkey"' \; select-pane -t 6 \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run practrand:64b:u64 -- -singlethreaded; npm run waitforkey"' \; npm run waitforkey' \; attach

author: Daniel Lehenbauer
